description: Schema defining mandatory inputs and calculation parameters for the Maximum Critical Risk Arbitrator (MCRA) to determine the S-02 Synthesis Projection (Risk Floor) in GSEP Stage 4.

RAC_Commitment_Ceiling.constraint: Maximum budgeted operational cost deviation (Overshoot tolerance).

ECR_Capacity_Index.constraint: Real-time system load relative to critical capacity (e.g., 1.0 = Max Load).

Precedent_Risk_Thresholds.constraint: Historic S-02 outcomes weighted by operational context similarity (for contextual anchoring).

S02_Calculation_Formula.formula: S-02 = Max( (w1 * RAC_Commitment_Ceiling), (w2 * ECR_Capacity_Index), Baseline_Floor ) + P_Deviation_Factor
